name: Spec Ops: Airborne Commando
description: The never-ending battle against the enemies of life, liberty, and justice is about to gain a new hero. Spec Ops: Airborne Commando is a 3rd-person action shooter sending YOU deep behind enemy lines to carry out top-secret covert operations. Rescue friendly forces, destroy strategic military structures, secure intelligence information, and eliminate high-profile targets. Remember your training, soldier, and you will make it out alive!
